ygData.subject: Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
ygData.msgSnippet: Enchantment of Light & Enchantment of Brilliance are not in the game yet. Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server) Servant of Light, Deliverer
ygData.messageBody:
Enchantment of Light & Enchantment of Brilliance are not in the game yet.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>
>
> I hit level 4 last nite and I spent a good amoun tof cash on buying ALL of
> the spells in this circle....and Id just like to
> say.....DAMN!!!!......there
> sre SO many.....I didnt even get ALL of them and I almost filled three

> BAT (HAHA!)

> Light to cast on my staff.....wouldnt that ROCK!!>....but I wasnt able to
> find it and I talked to a few enchanters that couldnt find it either last
> nite......Im in Erudin now but will be making my way to Rivervale shortly

> so WHERE??!!!......thnx in advance......
